meanings.definition: To make sensual or appealing to the senses.
meanings.sent1: She was sensualizing the room with scented candles.
meanings.sent2: The chef was sensualizing the dish with aromatic herbs.
meanings.sent3: The artist was sensualizing the painting by adding vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The music gently sensualized the atmosphere of the party.
meanings.sent5: The garden was sensualized by the blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: To indulge in or enjoy sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: They were sensualizing the spa experience with relaxing massages.
meanings.sent2: The couple was sensualizing their vacation by sunbathing on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The friends were sensualizing their movie night with delicious snacks.
meanings.sent4: The cat was sensually sensualizing the warmth of the sunbeam.
meanings.sent5: The child sensually sensualized the taste of the chocolate cake.
